title: All-optical modulation by plasmonic excitation of CdSe quantum dots
title_cn: CdSe量子点的等离子体激发全光调制
abstract: Photonics is a promising candidate technology for information processing, communication and data storage. Essential building blocks, such as logic elements and modulators, have been demonstrated. However, because of weak nonlinear light–matter interactions, these components typically require high power densities and large interaction volumes, limiting their application in dense chip-based integration. A solution may be found in surface plasmon polaritons (SPPs), guided electromagnetic waves that propagate with high field confinement along a metal–dielectric interface. We demonstrate an all-optical modulator in which efficient interaction between two light beams at different wavelengths is achieved by converting them into co-propagating SPPs interacting by means of a thin layer of CdSe quantum dots (QDs). The high SPP field confinement and high QD-absorption cross-section enable optical modulation at low power densities (∼102 W cm−2) in micrometre-scale planar devices.
abstract_cn: 光子学是用于信息处理，通信和数据存储的有前途的候选技术。已经演示了基本构件，例如逻辑元件和调制器。但是，由于弱的非线性光物质相互作用，这些组件通常需要高功率密度和较大的相互作用量，从而限制了它们在基于密集芯片的集成中的应用。可以在表面等离振子极化子（SPPs）中找到解决方案，这些问题是在高电场限制下沿金属介电界面传播的电磁波。我们演示了一种全光调制器，其中通过将两束光转换为借助CdSe量子点（QD）薄层相互作用的共传播SPP，可以实现不同波长的两个光束之间的有效相互作用。高SPP场限制和高QD吸收横截面可实现低功率密度（＆＃8764; 10 2 ＆＃160; W＆＃160; cm ＆＃8722; 2 ）在微米级平面设备中。

title: Electro–optically tunable microring resonators in lithium niobate
title_cn: 铌酸锂中的电光可调谐微环谐振器
abstract: Optical microresonators have recently attracted growing attention in the photonics community. Their applications range from quantum electrodynamics to sensors and filtering devices for optical telecommunication systems, where they will probably become an essential building block. Integration of nonlinear and electro–optical properties in resonators represents a very stimulating challenge, as it would incorporate new and more advanced functionality. Lithium niobate is an excellent candidate material, being an established choice for electro–optic and nonlinear optical applications. Here we report on the first realization of optical microring resonators in submicrometre thin films of lithium niobate. High-index-contrast films are produced by an improved crystal-ion-slicing and bonding technique using benzocyclobutene. The rings have radius R = 100 µm, and their transmission spectrum has been tuned using the electro–optic effect. These results open new possibilities for the use of lithium niobate in chip-scale integrated optical devices and nonlinear optical microcavities.
abstract_cn: 光学微谐振器最近在光子学界引起了越来越多的关注。它们的应用范围从量子电动力学到光学电信系统的传感器和滤波设备，在这里它们很可能会成为必不可少的组成部分。谐振器中非线性和电学特性的集成代表了一个非常刺激的挑战，因为它将结合新的和更高级的功能。铌酸锂是一种极好的候选材料，是电光和非线性光学应用的既定选择。在这里，我们报道了在铌酸锂的亚微米薄膜中光学微环谐振器的首次实现。通过使用苯并环丁烯的改进的晶体离子切片和键合技术，可以生产出高折射率薄膜。这些环的半径为R＆＃160; =＆＃160; 100＆＃160;＆＃181; m，并且它们的透射光谱已使用电光效应进行了调谐。这些结果为在芯片级集成光学器件和非线性光学微腔中使用铌酸锂开辟了新的可能性。

title: Terahertz transfer onto a telecom optical carrier
title_cn: 太赫兹传输到电信光载波上
abstract: In a GaAs crystal, owing to the anomalous dispersion introduced by optical phonon absorption, a phase-matched interaction is possible between a near-infrared beam and a terahertz (THz) wave. We exploit this nonlinear optical process to allow the merging of THz-quantum-cascade-laser and telecom technologies by injecting a telecom beam into a suitably designed THz quantum-cascade laser. Within the optical cavity, the phase and amplitude of the THz wave are recorded onto the near-infrared beam, which can be transported through an optical fibre. We show that the process is phase-matched and can be tuned over the entire telecom range by waveguide engineering. This nonlinear up-conversion technique opens up new possibilities in the optical treatment of THz, by taking advantage of the highly developed telecom technology.
abstract_cn: 在GaAs晶体中，由于光子吸收光引起的反常色散，近红外光束和太赫兹（THz）波之间可能发生相位匹配的相互作用。 通过将电信束注入适当设计的THz量子级联激光器中，我们利用这种非线性光学过程来实现THz-量子级联激光器和电信技术的融合。 在光腔内，太赫兹波的相位和幅度记录在近红外光束上，该光束可以通过光纤传输。 我们证明了该过程是相位匹配的，并且可以通过波导工程在整个电信范围内进行调谐。 利用先进的电信技术，这种非线性上转换技术为THz的光学处理开辟了新的可能性。

title: Actuation of micro-optomechanical systems via cavity-enhanced optical dipole forces
title_cn: 通过腔增强的光学偶极力驱动微光机械系统
abstract: Optical forces can produce significant mechanical effects in micro- and nanophotonic systems. Here we demonstrate a novel optomechanical system using a movable, micrometre-scale waveguide evanescently coupled to a high-Q optical microresonator. Micrometre-scale displacements of the waveguide are observed for milliwatt-level optical input powers. Measurement of the spatial variation of the force on the waveguide indicates that it arises from a cavity-enhanced optical dipole force resulting from the stored optical field of the resonator. This force is used to realize an all-optical tunable filter operating with submilliwatt control power. A theoretical model of the system shows that the maximum achievable force is independent of the intrinsic Q of the optical resonator and scales inversely with the cavity mode volume, suggesting that such forces may become even more effective as devices approach the nanoscale.
abstract_cn: 光学力可以在微和纳米光子系统中产生显着的机械效应。 在这里，我们演示了一种新颖的光机械系统，该系统使用可移动的微米级波导waveguide逝耦合至高Q光学微谐振器。 对于毫瓦级的光输入功率，可以观察到波导的微米级位移。 在波导上的力的空间变化的测量表明，它是由谐振腔的存储光场引起的腔增强光学偶极力引起的。 该力用于实现以亚毫瓦级控制功率工作的全光可调滤波器。 该系统的理论模型表明，最大可达到的力与光谐振器的固有Q无关，并且与腔模体积成反比，这表明，当器件接近纳米级时，这种力可能变得更加有效。
